## Getting started â˜„ï¸
Unity 2021.3.12f1 [[Download](https://unity3d.com/ru/unity/whats-new/2021.3.12)]

To install, go to Window > Package Manager > Add packages from Git URL:
```
https://github.com/Bit-of-Meat/air-controller.git#upm
```
